full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MDO SEMS THUN MONG BA'I BSDUS GRA'I RNAM BZHAG LEGS PA GCIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @102A *, ,SMRAS PA, GANG GI RIGS PA'I ZER 'PHRENG CHA SHAS 'GA', BLO YI KHANG BZANG BU GAR ZHUGS PAS KYANG, ,RAB RMONGS MUN PA'I GO SKABS KUN 'PHROG PA, ,SMRA BA'I NYI MA RJE BTZUN PAD DKAR 'CHANG, ,KHYOD KYI LEGS GSUNGS GSUM RTZEN LHA YI GRONG, ,RIGS PA'I 'JAM MNYEN LO 'DAB PHANG PHUNG CAN, ,RAB BYED M'A LI GSAR PA'I 'KHRI SHING 'DIS, ,BLO GSAL SNYING LA DGA' BA BSKYED MIN NAM, ,DGE LA MDUN PA RJE BTZUN THUGS RJE'I GTER, ,GANG GI RMAD BYUNG GSUNG RAB RGYA MTSO LAS, ,BLO BZANG MDZES BYED RIGS PA'I DO SHAL 'DI, ,DHARM'A KIRTI'I RAB DKAR BSAM PAS BKOD, ,KHA BA'I RDUL BRTZEGS ZLA ZHUN GSAR PA YIS, ,RAB DKAR MDZES PA'I SKAL BZANG BYAS PA BZHAN, ,DKAR BA'I BSOD NAMS THUB BSTAN DE 'DZIN RNAMS, ,PHAN TSUN 'GRAN BZHIN 'PHEL BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O,, LEGS S+HO,, BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
